#include<iostream>

int ispalindrome(long n)
{
	
	long x=n;
	long rev=0;
	
	while(n)
	{
		rev=rev*10 + n%10;
		
		n=n/10;
	}
	
	return (x==rev)?1:0;
}

int main()
{
	long q;
	scanf("%ld",&q);
	
	while(q--)
	{
	
	long t;
	scanf("%ld",&t);
	
	for(long i=t;;i++)
	{
		if(ispalindrome(i))
		{
			printf("%ld\n",i);
			break;
		}
	}
	
	}
}
